description:
We are seeking a Principal / Architect of AI Systems — a hands-on technical visionary who will define, accelerate, and unify all AI-related initiatives across the organization. This is not a people management role; it’s a deep technical leadership position focused on building, experimenting, and shaping the future of AI integration across our ecosystem.



This role blends research and implementation : part AI strategist, part hands-on builder, and part evangelist of best practices. The ideal candidate thrives on experimentation, stays ahead of emerging AI frameworks, and can translate innovation into production-grade systems that deliver real outcomes fast.



Core Responsibilities



️ Define and own the AI technical vision



- Set the overarching AI architecture and ensure consistency across teams and products.
- Guide how AI is designed, coded, tested, and deployed organization-wide.



Stay on the bleeding edge



- Spend ~50% of time exploring emerging models, frameworks, and paradigms (LLMs, agents, orchestration layers, etc.).
- Identify opportunities for innovation and translate research into tangible prototypes.



Build, validate, and ship



- Dedicate the other 50% to hands-on development — building prototypes, validating architectures, and accelerating AI integration across projects.
- Design and test agentic systems, model orchestration layers, and AI infrastructure patterns.



Evaluate and select technologies



- Drive tool selection for LLMs, frameworks, vector databases, embeddings, retrieval systems, and orchestration layers (LangChain, Bedrock, Azure OpenAI, etc.).
- Balance innovation with reliability, cost, and scalability.



Accelerate delivery cadence

- Champion rapid experimentation cycles — moving beyond slow, traditional sprints toward daily or near-daily delivery of AI outcomes.
- Instill a culture of visible, continuous improvement in AI development.



Standardize best practices



- Define how AI coding, testing, and deployment should be done across the company.
- Establish reusable templates, pipelines, and architecture patterns.



Mentor and evangelize



- Coach engineers and architects on responsible AI integration.
- Promote AI literacy and best practices across cross-functional teams.





Ideal Background



- 10+ years in software architecture, ML systems , or AI platform engineering .
- Proven experience with LLM integration , agentic systems , and AI infrastructure .
- Deep technical fluency with tools such as LangChain, Azure OpenAI, AWS Bedrock, Vector DBs, RAG pipelines , and MLOps workflows .
- Strong foundation in data engineering , DevOps , and AI system orchestration .
- Demonstrated ability to ship prototypes fast — not just theorize, but deliver.
- Track record of research-driven innovation and constant exploration of new models and frameworks.





Key Mindset & Attributes



- Research-Driven Builder: Obsessed with learning, testing, and applying the newest AI advances.
- Execution-Oriented: Moves fast, experiments intelligently, and delivers tangible results.
- Anti-Bureaucracy: Rejects unnecessary process; favors agility and iteration.
- Cross-Functional Connector: Works fluidly with data, cloud, and app teams to unify vision.
- Thought Leader: Defines standards, drives technical discipline, and inspires AI excellence across projects.



Ideal Candidate Profile



A Principal AI Architect or Staff-level AI Engineer who combines strategic vision with hands-on execution — capable of setting technical direction , architecting cutting-edge systems, and keeping the organization at the forefront of applied AI innovation.
